name: template-nodejs
description: Template for nodejs with unit gulp build, test, coverage, code guardian, github and Other defaults

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integ
scripts.printReportsLink: echo Detailed unit test coverage report: file:///$(pwd)/coverage-unit/index.html && echo Detailed integration test coverage report: file:///$(pwd)/coverage-integration/index.html
scripts.cover: npm run cover:unit && npm run cover:integ
scripts.cover:unit: c8 -c .nycrc.unit.json npm run test:unit && npm run --silent printReportsLink
scripts.cover:integ: c8 -c .nycrc.integration.json npm run test:integ && npm run --silent printReportsLink

author: Arun, core.ai
